## **Describe the bug 🔎**

How is this bug affecting the experience

## **To Reproduce 🧪**

Clear steps on how to reproduce this bug / behavior

## **Expected behavior 🔥**

What is expected to happen instead of a bug

## **Screenshot 🖼️ (optional)**

A screenshot of the website or the console
